generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and a central dividing line, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible along both sides of the road, bordered by curbs and lined with trees and buildings.
- building: Multiple buildings line both sides of the street, including commercial storefronts and residential structures.
- vegetation: Numerous trees are planted along the sidewalks and street, providing shade and greenery.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast and gray.
- car: Several cars are parked along the sides of the road, including a dark blue car and a silver car on the right, and a silver car on the left.
- traffic sign: A triangular traffic sign with a black symbol (indicating a pedestrian crossing) is visible on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic signs and streetlights.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
